nodes.description: This is my personal website which contains a portfolio and a resume. The tech stack used to build this is React  & Gatsby (with GraphQL) and Sanity for CMS.
nodes.name: Personal Website

nodes.description: Using this we can perform all the basic operations with text, like convert to uppercase or to lowercase, remove extra spaces, and much more. Tech Stack used is ReactJs.
nodes.name: TextUtils

nodes.description: Nowadays making a professional resume is not easy, so I have created one, just fill out the information, and you can download it in the form of a pdf. This is built on ReactJs with TypeScript.
nodes.name: Resume Builder

nodes.description: Twitter clone with some basic functionality like Login, Tweet, Like, Comment. This is built on NextJs (with ApolloClient & GraphQL) with TypeScript and Prisma (MySQL) for the database.
nodes.name: Twitter Clone
